title: 35m2 Studio next to the Louvre
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Available from August 10 to September 13.
One month 1600 euros 
One week 700 euros 

Very central, nice studio just 5 minutes walking distance from the Louvre (450 meters) and only 2 minutes away from the Palais Royal and Emily in Paris, office location in the TV show (150 meters).

Located in rue Croix des Petits Champs, on the fifth floor with an elevator, the studio overlooking a courtyard, is spacious, 35m2 (35 square meter equivalent to 375 square feet) and quiet.

Fully furnished, the living space is nice and cosy.
Very comfortable queen size bed and an additional fold-out sofa bed in case of need.
Linen and towels furnished.

The kitchenette is fully equipped with a micro-wave, vitroceramic cooktop, big fridge, washing machine, and Nespresso machine.
The bathroom is equipped with a bath/shower, WC, big sink cabinet and hair-dryer.

The area and the building are safe and secured (digicodes).

Palais Royal and Louvre are the closest Metro

No pets
No smoking
No parties or events

I am renting my own studio while I am away from August 10 to September 13.
Rental price is 110€/day (5 days minimum)
700 euros/week
For one month rent is 1600 euros.

Including all charges: water consumption, hot water, high speed internet, taxes, building maintenance fees, except electricity bill.
Guarantee deposit required.
Video of the studio is available upon request.

No agency fees.
